channel.title: Comments on: The G9, “Game play domination”

item.title: By: Velyn
item.dc:creator: Velyn
item.description:
The button statement is correct in current terms. There was a press release on the Logitech website about the changes being made to the G15. They have removed most of the macro buttons in the future model. <a href="http://gizmodo.com/gadgets/logitech/logitech-updates-g15-keyboard-with-gamepanel-lcd-screen-284720.php" rel="nofollow">Link to gizmodo article with picture</a>.
They broke it if you ask me. I love my current model G15 and will be purchasing at least 1 backup before they are gone forever.
item.content:encoded:
The button statement is correct in current terms. There was a press release on the Logitech website about the changes being made to the G15. They have removed most of the macro buttons in the future model.
Link to gizmodo article with picture.

They broke it if you ask me. I love my current model G15 and will be purchasing at least 1 backup before they are gone forever.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: I am not a better person than you. I am laughing right now.
item.content:encoded: I am not a better person than you. I am laughing right now.

item.title: By: Nereus
item.dc:creator: Nereus
item.description: gaming mouse and keyboard is serious business.
item.content:encoded: gaming mouse and keyboard is serious business.

item.title: By: steven
item.dc:creator: steven
item.content:encoded:
This statement

“The G15 keyboard also offers six on-the-fly programmable macro keys with three modes, for a total of 18 programmable keys per game or application”

Is incorrect. The G15 has 18 on-the-fly programmable keys with 3 separate modes, Offering 54 different macro options.
